description.en:
A collection of short stories:  
  
1) Hikitate Yaku no Koi [A Foil's Love]  
Chie's always played second. Friends with pretty Chika-chan she's only ever attracted the attention of boys seeking the role of Chika-chan's boyfriend. No one sees her for herself. But is that the case with Horikawa-kun?  
  
2) Isshun no Tsuki [A Glimmer of the Moon]  
Mizuho is in love with Shugo-sempai, and even manages to kiss him secretly under the cover of darkness. Only one problem. Shugo is the boyfriend of Mizuho's older sister!  
  
3) Koibito Kyoukaisen [The Dividing Line for a Lover]  
Aya is still a high school student. There is no way she is going to attend an Omiai (matchmaking) meeting with some strange guy! No matter how great this Keisuke guy seems to be…  
  
4) Doko Demo Issho [Always Together]  
Manami is always teased by her classmates for being ugly. Only Satoru-kun defends her. In fact, he declares he loves her! But this world is so cruel… they will have to find another world to live in!  
  
  
ITALIANO  
2) Isshun no Tsuki  
La studentessa Mizuho è innamorata del fidanzato di sua sorella maggiore,Shuugo. Un giorno decide di rubargli un bacio segreto, ma una tragedia inaspettata è in attesa …
